description.raw:
This merges pull request #2807 (attach light to link) and pull request #2805 (shadow improvements) forward to gazebo8. Since the `Entity::GetWorldPose` signature was changed in gazebo8 (ff6baf4) to return a copy instead of a reference, I added bfad93c which changes the `Light::GetWorldPose` signature and adds `Light::WorldPose`. I think I've fixed all the deprecation warnings.

This pull request is mostly checking CI, but I would like the bfad93c commit to be reviewed at least by @iche033.

Also, I see some comments about what to do when we can break ABI. Perhaps we can address those when merging forward to default.
